alert.note: Alert for Beaufort (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued May 25 at 8:48PM EDT until May 28 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 10 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...2 to 3 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the Pamlico and Pungo Rivers and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 10 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
